outputs.output_descr: This project aimes to promote the development of volunteerism through nurturing a more comprehensive NGO platform and voluntary public service for an improved social management and public health prevention system between Shanghai and Yunnan province.

This project aimes to further strengthen volunteering infrastructure in Beijing building on the success of the phase I cooperation and address the remaining challenges to increase the effectiveness and sustainability of volunteerism in China.

project_descr: The overall aim of this programme is to support the development of national and local volunteer infrastructures in China to promote people’s participation in social management and scale up volunteerism in China’s new development stage.
project_title: Umbrella Prog on volunteerism for development
